title: C1151 - Keyless Ignition Anti-Tamper Strategy Activated

body.body: C1151 - Keyless Ignition Anti-Tamper Strategy Activated
C1151 - Keyless Ignition Anti-Tamper Strategy Activated - Fault - PB1; PJ1; PJZ; PM1; PR1; PRC; PS1; PSC; PX1; PXC; PY1; PYC
Repeated attempts to turn the Ignition ON without a paired key in range
Wait at least three minutes after the last attempt to turn the ignition ON
Refresh the Read DTCs screen and make sure that C1151 is not re-triggered
Make sure a paired key is in range of the LF antenna when turning the ignition ON
If the ignition turns ON, no further action required
If the ignition does not turn ON, check C1151 has not been re-triggered

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: PJZ; PYC; PXC; PSC; PRC; PY1; PX1; PS1; PR1; PM1; PJ1; PB1
